title: Odessa Rae
summary: Odessa Rae is a Canadian film producer and actor, known for producing the documentary Navalny, which won the Best Documentary Feature at the 95th Academy Awards. She has acted in multiple feature films and TV episodes, including Hard Candy, Smallville, and Movie 43. Odessa was key in the formation of Ivanhoe Pictures, which produced the box office hit, Crazy Rich Asians. In 2021, Rae launched RaeFilm Studios, and is now focusing on the development and production of non-fiction content.Rae is working alongside producer Karim Amer on a documentary focused on the war in Ukraine, which is still in the filming process.
